text.__SUMMARY__: Inga yasuniana is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae. It is found only in Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests.
text.References: Neill, D. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Inga yasuniana". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T38099A10094135. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T38099A10094135.en. Retrieved 21 December 2017.
